BattleEffectText.Name: Radiant
BattleEffectText.Desc: The cost of Pages is reduced by -{0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Sleep
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can not act, can only be attacked by Maria Nearl. The status lasts for {0} Scene

BattleEffectText.Name: Deterring Radiance
BattleEffectText.Desc: Passive Deterring Radiance require {0} successful hits to be activated

BattleEffectText.Name: Bless of Pegasian
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of this Scene recover all allies 40% Max HP and all Staggerï¼Œ reduce stack by 1. Transform all Offensive Dice to Counter Defend Dice when using Pages

BattleEffectText.Name: Low Morale
BattleEffectText.Desc: The character's die lose -{0} Power, Stager Resist {1}%

BattleEffectText.Name: Keeping Momentum
BattleEffectText.Desc: Rolling Defensive Dice will use 1 Stack to boost its Power by +1

BattleEffectText.Name: Sudden Brake
BattleEffectText.Desc: Rolling Offensive Dice will use 1 Stack to boost its Power by +1
